mapper.select: select m.id,m.comp_id,m.top_pic,m.title,m.synopsis,m.content,m.state,m.created_at,m.created_name,m.modified_at, m.modified_name,m.release_at,m.release_name,m.markdown,comp.name as compName from s_message m,s_company comp where m.comp_id=comp.id and m.comp_id=#{compId} and m.is_delete=0
select id,name, case when id in(select comm_id from s_message_comm aa where aa.message_id=#{id}) then true else false end flag from r_community where comp_id = #{compId} and is_delete = 0
